it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core
Class SimulationObject

java.lang.Object
  it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core.SimulationObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Engine, Event, Node, Process
public class SimulationObject
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to abstract each simulation object, adding the member and methods to support the logging process.

Author:
Matteo Agosti (agosti@ce.unipr.it), Michele Amoretti (michele.amoretti@unipr.it)

setLoggerLevel

public void setLoggerLevel(java.lang.String loggerLevel)

Parameters:
